titleStmt.title: SII 7.21: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 21. (A.R. No. 21 of 1900). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE MANDAPA IN FRONT OF THE ILAMISVARA TEMPLE IN THE SAME VILLAGE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
śubhamastu.
svasti śrī . vijayāTbudhaya kaliyugavaruṣam 4 1000 6 100 4 10 2 Itaṉmeṟ cellāniṉṟa pilava varuṣam cittirai 1. śrīmaṉ rājādhirāja parameśvara śrī Accutadevamahārāyar vijayanakarasiṁhāsaṉattil Iruntu rācciyam paṇṇi Aruḷāniṉṟa kālat=tu Avar Ūḻiyam Irāmappaṉāyakkaṟkuk kuṉṟat=turtuṟkam cellumaṉṉāḷil koṅkāṉa vīracoḻamaṇṭalat=tu vaṭapūvāṇiyanāṭṭut tāramaṅkalam
veḷḷāḻar nīlaṅkiḻār mastakakuṭori makuṭacūṭāmaṇi vaṇṇattaṭukkum vāṭāmālaiyum pulikkoṭiyum yuḷḷa vaṇaṅkāmuṭimutaliyār nalluṭaiAppar koṭṭai mutaliyār Immaṭikaṭṭi mutaliyār citamparattil Aṉṉāyaṉār tirukkoyilukkut teṟku muṉṟām vītiyil ceṅkaḻunīrppiḷḷaiyār caṉṉatippuṟattut teṉciṟakil nilam ṭṭa 2 100kkuk koṇṭu vaṇaṅkāmuṭi Eṉṉum maṭaṅ kaṭṭi
viccu Ammaṭattil maheśvara pūjai naṭakkumpaṭikku Iṉṉāṭṭup paṭaivīṭṭu naṉcey puṉcey nāṟpāṅkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa cakalasvāmyamum viṭṭu Eṅkaḷ kāṇiyāṉa Eḻukaraināṭṭukkuḷḷāka naṭakku mupaiyamāṟkattil nāṉku ticai Aṉpattāṟu tecappalarāl dharmmacātaṉamum Eḻutiviccukkoṇṭu makamaiyuṅ kaṭṭiviccuk kuṭutta viparam piṭavaikkaṭṭu 1kku ṭṭa vaḥ pākku miḷaku kālnaṭai 1kku ṭṭa 1/8 Eḷḷuppoti 1kku ṭṭa 1/20+1/80 nūl
pañcu parutti Āvaṇakkumuttut tavacappoti kālnaṭaikku ṭṭa 1/20 cevakku ṭṭa 1/20+1/80 muttup pavaḷam paṉinīrccempu cantaṉaṅ kastūri kaṟpūram paṭṭunūl Iracakuṭukkai veḷḷāṭṭi taṇṭikaik kompu callicavaram ciccilikkaṭṭu Ivaikkellām kūṭiṉa tīrvaiyil ṭṭa 10kku ṭṭa 1/2 maṟṟumuḷḷa payiṟku miprakāran tīrntu candrātidyavarai naṭakkumpaṭiyuṅ kaṭṭup paṇṇikkuṭutteṉ Ittarmmattai vilakkiṉavaṉ puṇya
kālattil gaṁkaikkaraiyil brāhmaṇaṉai vataittavaṉpāvaṅ koḷḷakkaṭavaṉ Ivai cellapperumāḷ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 7.21 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
